name: Perfect World (itch) (TreyAwesomeGamer03)
description:
Wake up... Frei wake up... it's time to start your journey...

Welcome to the Positive World! A bright, colorful, fantasy utopia everyone is happy together! Or at least that's what we're made to believe... some say we hold a dark secret... and other say there's another world besides our own...

But they're all crazy! In the end... you just need to stay Positive.

Finally, after a year and a half of development, Perfect World is finally finished! Thank you all so much for the support over this time!

Perfect World includes:
  • Retro pixel art style.

  • Wonderful chiptune soundtrack.

  • Old school RPG battles from yesteryear.

  • Two large, fascinating worlds to explore with their own culture and secrets.

  • Charming and funny character dialogue and exchanges.

  • 4-6 hours of playtime.

Even thought development is finished, I will continue to work on the game, creating free updates and promises for even more content!
